com.css.asset.model.ProductController.insert: insert into PRODUCT( ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DETAIL) values( ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DETAIL)
com.css.asset.model.ProductController.update: update PRODUCT set PRODUCT_NAME = PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DETAIL = PRODUCT_DETAIL where ID = ID
com.css.asset.model.ProductController.selectForListProvider: select ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DETAIL from PRODUCT
com.css.asset.model.ProductController.selectById: select ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DETAIL from PRODUCT where ID = ID
com.css.asset.model.ProductController.delete: delete from PRODUCT where ID = ID
com.css.asset.model.ProductController.selectForArray: select ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DETAIL from PRODUCT
com.css.asset.model.ProductController.selectForArrayWithSql: select ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DETAIL from PRODUCT where SQL
